summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4173 for the improvement of East 62nd Street from Brooklyn Avenue to 15th Avenue Northeast, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49793 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
